title: My House
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 33 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR30L
description: Help students begin to identify and understand the different parts of a house with My House. Vibrant photographs, simple sentences, and high-frequency words support early emergent readers. Students will have the opportunity to identify the main idea and supporting details.
meta: bathroom, bedroom, dining room, door, hall, house, kitchen, living room
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Capitalization and Punctuation : Capitalize sentence beginnings and punctuate sentence endings
Alphabetical Order : Place words in alphabetical order

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
